NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages Update 4/7/2004
NewsArticle.Content: Rise of Andor - A new, 150 level, hunting area for Medenia, full of new creatures and item drops! Arena Circuit - Battle 45 combatants to become the Circuit Champion! Medenian Skills & Spells- A new system for learning Medenian Skills and Spells has been implemented. Check your legends to learn how to use it. Plus new skills and spells!
